tutorial.speak:
This tutorial will help you configure your tabs in the B1 mobile app. From the B1 dashboard, click Settings in the left sidebar.
Click on Mobile Apps to access the mobile app settings.
Click the Add Tab button in the top right to create a new tab.
The Add Tab dialog opens. Enter a name for your tab, such as Website.
Click on the icon to choose an icon for your tab.
The Select Icon modal opens with various icon options to choose from.
Click select image to add a custom image to your tab
Choose your image from the gallery, upload a photo or stock photos
The Tab Type dropdown offers many options including Bible, Live Stream, Donation, and more.
Enter the URL you want the tab to link to in the URL field.
Choose the Visibility setting to control who can see this tab.
Once you've configured all settings, click Save Tab.
Your new tab now appears in the App Tabs list.
